mapper.select: select * from item ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into item (name, category, vendor_name, warehouse_name, standard, price, image) values ( #{name}, #{category}, #{vendorName}, #{warehouseName}, #{standard}, #{price}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, vendor_name = #{vendorName}, warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, standard = #{standard}, image = #{image} WHERE idx = #{idx}
